        public Dictionary()

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        public void populate()
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Loads the content of the dictionary from a specific file. When loading the content, old content will be erased, so this may actually lead to a decrease in size in some conditions.
        Specified by:
        populate in interface DictionaryProc

      • preWord

        public boolean preWord(java.lang.String word)

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String word,
       java.lang.String synonym)
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Adds a new word to the dictionary. It may also be used to add a new synonym to a word. A word can not have itself as a synonym
        Specified by:
        add in interface DictionaryProc
        Parameters:
        word - word to add to the dictionary
        synonym - synonym of the added word

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String word)
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Removes word from dictionary
        Specified by:
        remove in interface DictionaryProc
        Parameters:
        word - word to remove

      • save

        public void save()
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Saves the dictionary to a file.
        Specified by:
        save in interface DictionaryProc

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search(java.lang.String word)
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Searches for a word in the dictionary. The characters '*' and '?' play the role of wildcards and can be used to search for words with a specified pattern '?' replaces a single character '*' replaces a variable number of characters
        Specified by:
        search in interface DictionaryProc
        Parameters:
        word - word to search for
        Returns:
        String ArrayList which contains all the matching words

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
        Description copied from interface: DictionaryProc
        Verifies if the dictionary contains a specific word
        Specified by:
        contains in interface DictionaryProc
        Parameters:
        word - word to be contained by the dictionary
        Returns:
        true if word is contained, false if not

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getSynonymsArray

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSynonymsArray(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the array of synonyms for the given word
        Parameters:
        key - word to search for synonyms
        Returns:
        String[] containing the synonyms of key

      • addFromFile

        public void addFromFile(java.lang.String pathname)
        Add new words to the dictionary from the file specified in the path. In order to avoid errors, the file must respect the input format
        Parameters:
        pathname - path to file

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empties the dictionary
